org.gradoop.flink.algorithms.fsm.dimspan.gspan

Class GSpanLogicBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.algorithms.fsm.dimspan.gspan.GSpanLogicBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, GSpanLogic
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectedGSpanLogic, UndirectedGSpanLogic

    public abstract class GSpanLogicBase
extends Object
implements GSpanLogic, Serializable
    Superclass of gSpan pattern growth and verification functionality.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • storeSingleEdgePatternEmbeddings

        protected abstract void storeSingleEdgePatternEmbeddings(PatternEmbeddingsMap patternEmbeddings,
                                                         int[] pattern,
                                                         int[] vertexIds,
                                                         int[] edgeIds,
                                                         int fromLabel,
                                                         int toLabel,
                                                         boolean loop)
        Add a pattern and create an embedding. Add both to the pattern-embedding map.
        Parameters:
        patternEmbeddings - pattern-embedding map
        pattern - current pattern
        vertexIds - embedding vertex ids
        edgeIds - embedding edge id
        fromLabel - minimal vertex label
        toLabel - maximal vertex label
        loop - true, if sourceId = targetId

        edgeId - edge id
        loop - true, if sourceId = targetId
        Returns:

                                         PatternEmbeddingsMap parentMap,

                                         boolean uncompressEmbeddings,
                                         List<int[]> compressedPatterns)
        Description copied from interface: GSpanLogic
        Grows children of all supported frequent patterns in a graph.
        Specified by:
        growPatterns in interface GSpanLogic
        Parameters:
        graph - graph
        parentMap - k-edge patter-embedding map
        frequentPatterns - k-edge frequent patterns
        rightmostPaths - k-edge rightmost paths
        uncompressEmbeddings - flag, to enable embedding decompression (true=enabled)
        compressedPatterns - compressed k-edge frequent patterns for map lookup
        Returns:
        map of grown supported patterns

      • getExtensionIsOutgoing

        protected abstract boolean getExtensionIsOutgoing(int[] graph,
                                                  int edgeId,
                                                  boolean fromFrom)
        Check, if an extension is in in or against direction.
        Parameters:
        graph - graph
        edgeId - extension's edge id
        fromFrom - true, if extension is made from the edge's from id. (edges are already 1-edge DFS codes and thus have a FROM instead of SOURCE id)
        Returns:
        true, if extension is in the edge's direction
